      • init

        public void init(ThreadContext context)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: LocalSearchStrategyBase
        Initializes the strategy, called once before the first LocalSearchStrategyBase#getNextTransition(ThreadContext) is called for every new thread.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        context - The ThreadContext which contains necessary informations. Should be assigned to a field.

      • getNextTransition

        public ITransition getNextTransition(boolean lastWasSuccesful)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: LocalSearchStrategyBase
        Returns the next ITransition to fire, the next step in the design space. It can be a quite complex method or a simple depth first search.
        Specified by:
        getNextTransition in class LocalSearchStrategyBase
        Parameters:
        lastWasSuccesful - False if the last returned transition was already fired by someone and therefore should choose an other transition, otherwise true.
        Returns:
        An ITransition which is not traversed yet. Null if there is no more to fire.

      • newStateIsProcessed

                       boolean constraintsNotSatisfied)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: LocalSearchStrategyBase
        Called after the chosen transition is fired and the new state has been processed.
        Specified by:
        newStateIsProcessed in class LocalSearchStrategyBase
        Parameters:
        isAlreadyTraversed - True if the new state is already traversed in the past.
        fitness - A map containing the values of the objectives.

      • interrupted

        public void interrupted()
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: LocalSearchStrategyBase
        Called if the exploration process is interrupted for example by timeout. Exit by returning null in the LocalSearchStrategyBase#getNextTransition(ThreadContext, boolean) method witch is called right after this one.
        Specified by:
        interrupted in class LocalSearchStrategyBase
